title: SUPER  lAGG after Up patch today
body:
Hi Riot
before  I get  login the game have Update  patch and after I login play for two games . it so lagg .

Where (what city) are you playing from?
- I playing from Adelaide

What is your normal ping to League?
-35 to 60

What kind of internet connection do you have (Cable / ADSL)?
-ADSL iiNET
- I used cable 

Do you connect your computer to the internet via a cable or via Wifi?
-Laptop

Please help me fix it
thank you
